item.title: Go Interface
item.author: Author
item.description: package main import "fmt" // 接口定义 type USB interface { info() string connect() string } type Infomation struct { name string model string } //实现 func (mobile Infomation) info() string{ return mobile.name+mobile.model } // 实现 func (pc Infomation) connect() string{ return pc.name } func main() { var u USB u = Infomation{name:"nokia", model:"n-73"} u.connect() fmt.Println(u) }
